%title MarkDown

= About =
[[http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/|Markdown]] is written by [[http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/|Perl]]<br>
And there are some implementation by other languages, such as [[http://freewisdom.org/projects/python-markdown/|Python]], in Gentoo, it is `dev-python/markdown`<br>
